titles: A wonder and yet no wonder a great red dragon in heaven.
author: Hyde, Edward, 1607-1659.
publisher: Printed by J. Macock, for Giles Calvert, at the black spread Eagle at the west end of Pauls,
notes: Epistle to the reader signed: Edw. Hide Junior.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb 21 1650"; imprint date crossed through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T. --  Revelation XII, 3-4 --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
